sub_described_item.description: Move horizontally or vertically to a new cell. You will absorb half of the destination cell's value. The other half will be placed in the cell you leave.
sub_described_item.strategy_tip: You cannot pass blocked cells or cells that are a higher number than you.

sub_described_item.description: If the result of a move would be more than 99, a split will occur instead.
sub_described_item.strategy_tip: A split makes two consciousness shards from one. This is very important.

sub_described_item.description: Click a shard to destroy it, and anything adjacent to it.
sub_described_item.strategy_tip: This is the primary way to destroy daemons and blocked cells. At least one shard must survive in order for others to execute a corruption.

hacking_action.description: Move horizontally or vertically to a new cell, taking on its value. The target cell cannot be blocked or a higher number than you. One of its adjacent unblocked cells must be a higher number than the target.
hacking_action.strategy_tip: Cannot pass occupied cells, but there are no other restrictions. Be VERY careful moving to low numbers. It is possible to trap a shard.

sub_described_item.description: Click a shard to destroy it, and anything adjacent to it.
sub_described_item.strategy_tip: This is the primary means of destroying daemons and blocked cells. At least one shard must survive in order for others to execute a corruption.

hacking_action.description: Click a shard that is in a line with one or more additional shards to burn lines between them.
hacking_action.strategy_tip: This does not consume the shards, but instead costs one Mental Energy.

hacking_action.description: Move horizontally or vertically to a new cell. The target cell cannot be blocked, and must be within 5 cells.

sub_described_item.description: Click your shard to destroy anything directly adjacent to it, including walls.
sub_described_item.strategy_tip: Your shard is not destroyed in this process.
